content.rendered:
Air Malta plc is the flag carrier airline of Malta, with its headquarters in Luqa and its hub at Malta International Airport. It was founded on 1973. It operates services to destinations in Europe, Middle East and North Africa.

 

 

Air Malta Address : Luqa, Malta

Phone : +356 21 662 211

Email: customercare.airmalta@airmalta.com

Opening hours: 
Monday to Friday from 08.00 to 20.00
Saturday and Sunday from 08.00 to 18.00

Air Malta Official website : https://www.airmalta.com/

Fleet size: 09

Current fleet

  • Airbus A320-200
  • Airbus A320neo

Air Malta Baggage Allowance

Air Malta Baggage

View Air Malta Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Travelling With Pets in Air Malta

You have three options to carry your pet on Air Malta scheduled flights:

  • Pets carried in the passenger cabin (PETC) – only cats & dogs up to 10 kgs including carrier
  • Pets as Accompanied Checked in Baggage (AVIH) – cats, dogs, hares, rabbits, ferrets and birds up to 32kgs including carrier
  • Pets in Cargo hold

Queries handled by Air Malta Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy, Flypass KMiles

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Air Malta in Luqa, Malta Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Air Malta in Luqa, Malta: (click on the stars below)
